title: How to write a paragraph on the lockdown - Quora

response.answer_text: Plan to write yourself with the number of sentences,say 10. First in the first twho sentences trace the origin of the Corona virus and the history of its spread. In the next two sentences describe about its global spread with figures and economical implications. In the last six sentences spell out the periods of lockdown and the likely developments in future with some hope in future. You can increase the number of sentences with the above base. Hope I have helped you.
